Package io.github.sirnik.daduels.utils

Class MessageManager

java.lang.Object
io.github.sirnik.daduels.utils.MessageManager
public class MessageManager
extends Object
Manager that sends messages to players from set plugin

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  MessageManager.MessageType
    Provides mood types for message sending.

    MessageManager    		 getManager​(T... recipients)
    Get the messagemanager from a cache or create a new one.
    void sendHoverMessage​(MessageManager.MessageType messagetype, String msg, String hover, String cmd)

  • Method Details

    • getManager

      @SafeVarargs public static <T extends org.bukkit.command.CommandSender> MessageManager getManager​(T... recipients)
      Get the messagemanager from a cache or create a new one. Prefix is created from the name of the main file
      Type Parameters:
      T - Type of recipient (typically either console sender or player)
      Parameters:
      recipients - The conversables that receive message
      Returns:
      instance of MessageManager

    • setPrefix

      public void setPrefix​(String prefix)

    • setName

      public void setName​(String name)
      Explicitly changes the name of the command prefix
      Parameters:
      name - Name to be given to the prefix of the command

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage​(MessageManager.MessageType type, String string)
      Sends a message to a recipient
      Parameters:
      type - Type of message, see MessageManager.MessageType
      string - The message body

    • sendHoverMessage

      public void sendHoverMessage​(MessageManager.MessageType messagetype, String msg, String hover, String cmd)
      Sends a JSON message to players for class info with cmd to click and hover to show message to hover Note: Conversable recipient(s) must be of type player
      Parameters:
      messagetype - Message colour
      msg - The message body itself
      hover - Message that is shown on hover
      cmd - Command that is run on click

    • sendHoverMessageHeadless

      public void sendHoverMessageHeadless​(MessageManager.MessageType messagetype, String msg, String hover, String cmd)
      Sends a JSON message to players for class info with cmd to click and hover to show message to hover. This method differs from sendHoverMessage(MessageType, String, String, String) by not sending the plugin prefix Note: Conversable recipient(s) must be of type player
      Parameters:
      messagetype - Message colour
      msg - The message body itself
      hover - Message that is shown on hover
      cmd - Command that is run on click
